MovieScript: Wukong, Bajie, and ErLang cross paths when a powerful artifact goes missing from the heavenly realm, threatening the balance between gods and mortals.   Wukong, seeking redemption for his past defiance, sets out to recover it, while Bajie, ever the opportunist, joins for his own gain.   Meanwhile, ErLang, tasked with maintaining order, views Wukong as a threat and pursues him relentlessly.
